name: elegiacally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or is similar to an elegy (= a sad poem or song, especially remembering someone who has died or something in the past): The author was able to describe the country elegiacally because it was his homeland. Her poem elegiacally laments a past love. Related words
elegiac
elegy
More examplesFewer examplesNobody has written more elegiacally about this country than he has.The poem spoke elegiacally about the natural beauty of England's countryside.She spoke elegiacally about the country she came from.We looked back elegiacally on our old life together.His speech elegiacally recalled the friend he had lost.
